item.title: Adding Custom Crowns
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Wtf mw2 prestige was my idea! With the rank crowns and all. Can someone help me do it?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Custom Crowns
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

[quote="~icestorm~, post:2, topic:352820"][quote author=Cowarooroo link=topic=449135.msg3295247#msg3295247 date=1280895525]
Ok so I want to know how to add crowns for regular players, I’m making a rank system and I want each rank to have a different thing. Sooo… how would I do that, I have the sprites and just tell me what to add to the client and what to add to the following code.

if (rank == 1) { ...................... }

TO BE SPECIFIC! I’m making a 6 rank system on my server based off of total exp. I want it when you type ::players, to show (rank picture) (Name). That’s it.
[/quote]Im making something like this for my server, A Cod like perstige system that will load custom crowns for people that have perstiged, So I will be happy to give you the code for it and you edit it for your server when im done[/quote]
My msn is bdowning0912@hotmail.com and I’m using the halo rank system =p.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Custom Crowns

item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

Ok so I want to know how to add crowns for regular players, I’m making a rank system and I want each rank to have a different thing. Sooo… how would I do that, I have the sprites and just tell me what to add to the client and what to add to the following code.

if (rank == 1) { ...................... }

TO BE SPECIFIC! I’m making a 6 rank system on my server based off of total exp. I want it when you type ::players, to show (rank picture) (Name). That’s it.
